course.title: CSI 2132 Databases I (3 units)
course.desc: Fundamental database concepts. Entity-Relationship modeling. Relational algebra and relational calculus. Relational databases. Database definition and manipulation using SQL. Embedded SQL. Functional dependencies and normalization. Introduction to physical database design. Design and implementation of a database application in a team project.Course Component: Laboratory, Lecture, TutorialPrerequisite: CSI 2110.
